plot: Jairo Mora wakes up to find that Omar Rincon, his upstairs neighbor, is about to jump off the ledge. A coffee and a good hefty breakfast are enough to momentarily quell Omar's anxiety.
title: Desayuno con el suicida
plot_es: Jairo Mora wakes up to find that Omar Rincon, his upstairs neighbor, is about to jump off the ledge. A coffee and a good hefty breakfast are enough to momentarily quell Omar's anxiety.
plot_en: Jairo Mora wakes up to find that Omar Rincon, his upstairs neighbor, is about to jump off the ledge. A coffee and a good hefty breakfast are enough to momentarily quell Omar's anxiety.
